1.content: One day, Lockette was fluttering around the Alfea campus, when she saw a gem, about the size of a pea, that pulsated red, gold, and purple. "Oh, my, what's this?" wondered the little pixie. When Lockette touched the gem, she suddenly felt a feeling of incredible power well up within her small pixie body, and a moment later began shooting up to.....
1.title: The Beginning

11.content: As Lockette grew she was panicking, and when she was done growing, she started to cry from the destruction from her growth. Lockette's tears ended up flooding what was left of the school. Thankfully, though, everyone got out to safety in time while Lockette was growing. At that moment, someone flies up to Lockette's face. But who is it?
11.title: 70 feet tall

choices: Use a spell on her to get her attention...
111.content:
It was Bloom, Lockette's partner fairy. "Are you ok Lockette?" said Bloom. Unfortunately Lockette was so busy crying that she didn't hear Bloom. "I've got to get her attention, but how?" Said Bloom.


How is she going to get her attention?
111.title: Bloom...

choices: Lockette decided to see what she could do with her new size
1111.content: Bloom tugged hard on Lockette's hair. That was enough to get the giant pixie's attention. "Oh, Bloom, I didn't see you there." Lockette said when she saw Bloom hovering by her face. "Don't be sad, Lockette, I'm sure being big won't be so bad."
1111.title: Pull her hair...

choices: A monster the same size Lockette was now showed up
The other Winx girls flew over to see what was going on
11113.title: Something else happened

choices: The Winx girls tried to get her attention
Lockette saw a monster attacking Magix
Lockette got hungry from all the growing
13.content: "Oh, my, I am so enormous now!" said Lockette as she found herself towering over the Alfea Campus. Just then....
13.title: 900 feet tall

choices: Lockette saw Bloom and the other Winx Club girls standing on top of a building
Lockette saw Proffesor Faragonda flying in front of her face
132.content:
The monster was about the same size Lockette was now, and it had 3 eyes and 4 arms and was covered in red fur.

"Oh, I must stop that monster before it destroys the city!" said Lockette. She flew at the monster and wrestled it to the ground. The monster fought back, and it looked like Lockette was loosing, but then she put up her arms to defend herself, and a beam of purple light shot from her hands and blew the monster across the city. "Wow, it looks like that gem did more than make me big." Lockette said in awe. Then she glared at the monster and said: "Now, you leave little creatures like these people alone, you here me?" The monster nodded and limped off back to its lair.
132.title: Lockette saw a monster attacking Magix

1322.content: No sooner had Lockette dealt with the monster, than she began growing again! She stopped growing at....
1322.title: Lockette grew bigger

choices: Yes and now the Winx must deal with there friend
No, something or someone stops Darcy
133.content: As she looks to the west, Lockette sees the Trix, Icy the leader, Darcy the queen of darkness, and Stormy the weather mistress. All 3 were heading her way and the Winx spot them just in time, and a fierce battle had started among them. However Lockette even at her new size was afraid. After awhile, the battle was at a stalemate for the time being. That's when Darcy had an idea. Her idea was to use her powers to take control of Lockette, but did Darcy manage to do it?
133.title: The Trix

choices: Pinned the Trix under her foot
Trapped the Trix with her magic
1332.content: But when Darcy cast her mind-control spell, it fizzled out impotently upon hitting Lockette's forehead! When Lockette realized that the Trix couldn't harm her at this size, she....
1332.title: No, something or someone stops Darcy

info.brief_description: Little Lockette the pixie becomes a mighty giantess!
info.description:
One day, Lockette, Bloom's bonded pixie, finds a strange gem that turns her from a tiny pixie into a massive giantess. I do not own Winx Club and make no profit off of this story.

Rules:
-No graphic violence, sex, or swearing
-Lockette is mostly gentle, be she might use her new size to her advantage, and she might have to fight the Trix or other villains
-All other characters must also be in-character
